casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. RICHARD L. WOSIKA, Defendant.

DECISION

No. 6843-B DATED this 13th day of May, 1977.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of Eight years imposed on January 20, 1977, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank Nicholas Spika, of the Montana Defender Project, for his assistance to the defendant and to this Court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack L. Green, Chairman, Peter G. Meloy.
